meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Arthur Tiersky Bob Mandel Bruce Borchardt Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #2445.

td.p: Arthur Tiersky, originally from Lincolnwood, Illinois
Bob Mandel, an on-scene coordinator originally from Manchester, New Hampshire
Bruce Borchardt, a metrologist originally from Denver, Colorado (whose 4-day cash winnings total $48,099)

tr.td: TELEVISION
TRANSPORTATION
FIRE!
ESCAPES
"HOT" STUFF
